name: Twinedle
description:
Although I realise the six-letter Wordle idea has been done before, I don't believe anybody's yet made such a game using Twine.

Partly to prove that could be done and partly because I wanted to put together my own word list, I thought I'd give it a try!

Really, though, this took quite a bit of effort so I'm keen to see it reach as many people as possible.

I find these things often depend heavily on word-of-mouth.

Lovely Pleasant Teatime Simulator, for example, got a great response partly because it invited people to spread the word on Twitter.

For that reason - and for one day only - I've decided to run a little competition!

Over on Twitter, share your streak with the hashtag #Twinedle, and the person with the highest after 24 hours (00:01am on April 2nd, 2022) will win a fabulous prize!¹

Obviously I've got no way of confirming that people actually attained the streaks they're claiming - it's just a hashtag and a number - but I trust you not to cheat.

Looking forward to seeing how you do!

¹ ᴾʳᶦᶻᵉ ᵛᵃˡᵘᵉᵈ ᵃᵗ ᵃᵖᵖʳᵒˣᶦᵐᵃᵗᵉˡʸ ⁵⁰ᵖ ⁻ ᵇᵘᵗ ᴵ ᵖʳᵒᵐᶦˢᵉ ʸᵒᵘ ᶦᵗ ʳᵉᵃˡˡʸ ᶦˢ ᶠᵃᵇᵘˡᵒᵘˢᵎ
